dmca.title: Fake site, hosted by theplanet
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal
<http://www.theplanet.com/legal> .

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


________________________________

From: ScamHuntingCrew We will get you MUGU
[mailto:scamhuntingcrew@gmail.com] 
Posted At: Saturday, September 16, 2006 5:01 AM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: Fake site, hosted by theplanet
Subject: Fake site, hosted by theplanet


How come this site still up?

http://www.bancpastor.com/

This site is created by criminals, hosted by you, we (aa419.org) has
send you quite a few emails about this before. 

Why on earth do theplanet keep on/continue their support for criminals?

Time to act now, don't you think?

aa419.org thread
http://forum.aa419.org/viewtopic.php?t=4940

Our database
http://db.aa419.org/fakebanksview.php?key=8259

ScamHuntingCrew
